Amalgamated Bank 
ENVIRONMENTAL 
LEADERSHIPCLIMATE CHANGE IS A REAL 
THREAT TO OUR PLANET, AND 
MUST BE ADDRESSED WITH  
BOLD AND TRANSPARENT 
SOLUTIONS DIRECTED BY  
THOSE ON THE FRONTLINES 
2019 was the second hottest 
year on record, according to the 
National Oceanic and Atmospheric 
Administration, which implies that the 
goals of the Paris Climate Agreement 
(to keep the increase in global 
average temperature to well below 
2° C above pre-industrial levels and 
to pursue efforts to limit the increase 
to 1.5° C) cannot be met unless drastic 
efforts are taken to globally reduce 
greenhouse gas emissions and adapt 
to the effects of climate change.Amalgamated Bank 34
